prod_short_desc: Suit up with Clay and turn the Stone monsters to dust!
prod_long_desc:
Upgrade your fighting skills with the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ Battle Suit Clay play set, featuring a buildable battle suit with posable limbs, minifigure cockpit, super-sized sword, giant fist and a Combo NEXO Power shield. Includes five scannable shields for NEXO Powers that provide unique battle skills in the digital game, plus a new-for-spring-2017 Clay minifigure.
Includes a special Clay minifigure.
Features a buildable battle suit with highly posable limbs and a minifigure cockpit.
Also includes a super-sized buildable sword.
Accessory elements include a Combo NEXO Power shield and five scannable NEXO Powers.
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents' permission.
Scan shields for each of the five NEXO Powers (Titanium Sword, Mechanical Griffin, Commanding Shout, Flame Wreck and Chicken Power) and create your own combinations to power up and defeat the Stone monsters in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game.
Combine with vehicles in other LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets to enhance the battle suit with futuristic functions!
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ episodes on Cartoon Network.
Stands over 3” tall.
